message: Reviewer agents have specific naming pattern: 'reviewer-{review_id_prefix}-{number}' where review_id_prefix is 8 chars from review UUID

data.details: When trigger_agentic_review is called, it generates review_id like 'review-abc123...' and creates agents with type 'reviewer-abc123-1', 'reviewer-abc123-2' etc.

message: Backend API already exposes all necessary data to identify reviewer agents - agent.type field contains 'reviewer-' prefix pattern
ReviewData model is also exposed via /api/tasks/{task_id} endpoint in TaskDetail.reviews field, providing additional context about review status
